key_risks: Industry cyclicality and supply chain disruptions

Legal risks from class-action lawsuit alleging wage and hour violations
controversies: Class-action lawsuit filed in December 2022 for wage and hour violations in California
environmental_issues: Reliance on global supply chains introduces risks related to water stewardship and climate change impacts
social_issues: Potential vulnerabilities in labor practices highlighted by the class-action lawsuit
governance_issues: Need for continuous investment in R&D to avoid technological obsolescence
